title: The Penguin data set explored
text:
In this post we will show some plots based on the Penguins data set.


Show the code
library(palmerpenguins)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

penguins %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  facet_wrap(sex ~ species, ncol = 2)

title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.

title: About
text:
My name is Paul van Oppen and I am an engineer. I have been in quality management for a long time. Working all of my life in the high-tech sector in Europe, China and Australia. I have a passion for data analysis and R.
I write about data analysis, life (a Dutch person living in Australia), places I visit and anything else that comes into my mind.
Writing a blog is a challenge for me: I am mostly not a ‘wordy’ person with the exception of topics that I deeply care for. Working on this blog is scary in a sense as it exposes a lot of me to the world. Some of my reasons to do so:

Organise my mind.
